name: Purpose
text:
INTERSTATE BRANCHING AND BANK
MERGERS

     It is the express intent of this article to permit interstate branching under sections 102 and 103 of the Riegle-Neal Interstate Banking and Branching Efficiency Act of 1994, Public Law No. 103-328, in accordance with the provisions set forth in this article. [L 1996, c 155, pt of §1]
